elanoma That Can Be Removed By Surgery
		                    Treatment of stage III melanoma that can be removed by surgery may include the following:         - Surgery to remove the tumor and some of the normal tissue around it. Skin grafting may be done to cover the wound caused by surgery. Sometimes lymph node mapping and sentinel lymph node biopsy are done to check for cancer in the lymph nodes at the same time as the surgery to remove the tumor.
